DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the detection rate and false negative rate of sentinel lymph node biopsy following previous surgical biopsy for early breast cancer diagnosis.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Sentinel Lymph Node Assessment Following Previous Surgical Biopsy for Early Breast Cancer
